00057 struct mds_device {
00058         /* super-class */
00059         struct md_device         mds_md_dev;
00060         struct ptlrpc_service   *mds_regular_service;
00061         struct ptlrpc_service   *mds_readpage_service;
00062         struct ptlrpc_service   *mds_out_service;
00063         struct ptlrpc_service   *mds_setattr_service;
00064         struct ptlrpc_service   *mds_mdsc_service;
00065         struct ptlrpc_service   *mds_mdss_service;
00066         struct ptlrpc_service   *mds_fld_service;
00067         struct mutex             mds_health_mutex;
00068 };
00069 
00070 /*
00071  *  * Initialized in mdt_mod_init().
00072  *   */
00073 static unsigned long mdt_num_threads;
00074 module_param(mdt_num_threads, ulong, 0444);
00075 MODULE_PARM_DESC(mdt_num_threads, "number of MDS service threads to start (deprecated in favor of mds_num_threads)");
00076 
00077 static unsigned long mds_num_threads;
00078 module_param(mds_num_threads, ulong, 0444);
00079 MODULE_PARM_DESC(mds_num_threads, "number of MDS service threads to start");
00080 
00081 static char *mds_num_cpts;
00082 module_param(mds_num_cpts, charp, 0444);
00083 MODULE_PARM_DESC(mds_num_cpts, "CPU partitions MDS threads should run on");
00084 
00085 static unsigned long mds_rdpg_num_threads;
00086 module_param(mds_rdpg_num_threads, ulong, 0444);
00087 MODULE_PARM_DESC(mds_rdpg_num_threads, "number of MDS readpage service threads to start");
00088 
00089 static char *mds_rdpg_num_cpts;
00090 module_param(mds_rdpg_num_cpts, charp, 0444);
00091 MODULE_PARM_DESC(mds_rdpg_num_cpts, "CPU partitions MDS readpage threads should run on");
00092 
00093 /* NB: these two should be removed along with setattr service in the future */
00094 static unsigned long mds_attr_num_threads;
00095 module_param(mds_attr_num_threads, ulong, 0444);
00096 MODULE_PARM_DESC(mds_attr_num_threads, "number of MDS setattr service threads to start");
00097 
00098 static char *mds_attr_num_cpts;
00099 module_param(mds_attr_num_cpts, charp, 0444);
00100 MODULE_PARM_DESC(mds_attr_num_cpts, "CPU partitions MDS setattr threads should run on");
00101 
00102 /* device init/fini methods */
00103 static void mds_stop_ptlrpc_service(struct mds_device *m)
00104 {
00105         ENTRY;
00106 
00107         mutex_lock(&m->mds_health_mutex);
00108         if (m->mds_regular_service != NULL) {
00109                 ptlrpc_unregister_service(m->mds_regular_service);
00110                 m->mds_regular_service = NULL;
00111         }
00112         if (m->mds_readpage_service != NULL) {
00113                 ptlrpc_unregister_service(m->mds_readpage_service);
00114                 m->mds_readpage_service = NULL;
00115         }
00116         if (m->mds_out_service != NULL) {
00117                 ptlrpc_unregister_service(m->mds_out_service);
00118                 m->mds_out_service = NULL;
00119         }
00120         if (m->mds_setattr_service != NULL) {
00121                 ptlrpc_unregister_service(m->mds_setattr_service);
00122                 m->mds_setattr_service = NULL;
00123         }
00124         if (m->mds_mdsc_service != NULL) {
00125                 ptlrpc_unregister_service(m->mds_mdsc_service);
00126                 m->mds_mdsc_service = NULL;
00127         }
00128         if (m->mds_mdss_service != NULL) {
00129                 ptlrpc_unregister_service(m->mds_mdss_service);
00130                 m->mds_mdss_service = NULL;
00131         }
00132         if (m->mds_fld_service != NULL) {
00133                 ptlrpc_unregister_service(m->mds_fld_service);
00134                 m->mds_fld_service = NULL;
00135         }
00136         mutex_unlock(&m->mds_health_mutex);
00137 
00138         EXIT;
00139 }
00140 
00141 static int mds_start_ptlrpc_service(struct mds_device *m)
00142 {
00143         static struct ptlrpc_service_conf conf;
00144         struct obd_device *obd = m->mds_md_dev.md_lu_dev.ld_obd;
00145         struct proc_dir_entry *procfs_entry;
00146         int rc = 0;
00147         ENTRY;
00148 
00149         procfs_entry = obd->obd_proc_entry;
00150         LASSERT(procfs_entry != NULL);
00151 
00152         conf = (typeof(conf)) {
00153                 .psc_name               = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME,
00154                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = MDT_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00155                 .psc_buf                = {
00156                         .bc_nbufs               = MDS_NBUFS,
00157                         .bc_buf_size            = MDS_REG_BUFSIZE,
00158                         .bc_req_max_size        = MDS_REG_MAXREQSIZE,
00159                         .bc_rep_max_size        = MDS_REG_MAXREPSIZE,
00160                         .bc_req_portal          = MDS_REQUEST_PORTAL,
00161                         .bc_rep_portal          = MDC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00162                 },
00163                 /*
00164                  * We'd like to have a mechanism to set this on a per-device
00165                  * basis, but alas...
00166                  */
00167                 .psc_thr                = {
00168                         .tc_thr_name            = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME,
00169                         .tc_thr_factor          = MDS_THR_FACTOR,
00170                         .tc_nthrs_init          = MDS_NTHRS_INIT,
00171                         .tc_nthrs_base          = MDS_NTHRS_BASE,
00172                         .tc_nthrs_max           = MDS_NTHRS_MAX,
00173                         .tc_nthrs_user          = mds_num_threads,
00174                         .tc_cpu_affinity        = 1,
00175                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_MD_THREAD,
00176                 },
00177                 .psc_cpt                = {
00178                         .cc_pattern             = mds_num_cpts,
00179                 },
00180                 .psc_ops                = {
00181                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00182                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00183                         .so_hpreq_handler       = ptlrpc_hpreq_handler,
00184                 },
00185         };
00186         m->mds_regular_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&conf, procfs_entry);
00187         if (IS_ERR(m->mds_regular_service)) {
00188                 rc = PTR_ERR(m->mds_regular_service);
00189                 CERROR("failed to start regular mdt service: %d\n", rc);
00190                 m->mds_regular_service = NULL;
00191 
00192                 RETURN(rc);
00193         }
00194 
00195         /*
00196          * readpage service configuration. Parameters have to be adjusted,
00197          * ideally.
00198          */
00199         memset(&conf, 0, sizeof(conf));
00200         conf = (typeof(conf)) {
00201                 .psc_name               = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_readpage",
00202                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = MDT_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00203                 .psc_buf                = {
00204                         .bc_nbufs               = MDS_NBUFS,
00205                         .bc_buf_size            = MDS_BUFSIZE,
00206                         .bc_req_max_size        = MDS_MAXREQSIZE,
00207                         .bc_rep_max_size        = MDS_MAXREPSIZE,
00208                         .bc_req_portal          = MDS_READPAGE_PORTAL,
00209                         .bc_rep_portal          = MDC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00210                 },
00211                 .psc_thr                = {
00212                         .tc_thr_name            = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_rdpg",
00213                         .tc_thr_factor          = MDS_RDPG_THR_FACTOR,
00214                         .tc_nthrs_init          = MDS_RDPG_NTHRS_INIT,
00215                         .tc_nthrs_base          = MDS_RDPG_NTHRS_BASE,
00216                         .tc_nthrs_max           = MDS_RDPG_NTHRS_MAX,
00217                         .tc_nthrs_user          = mds_rdpg_num_threads,
00218                         .tc_cpu_affinity        = 1,
00219                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_MD_THREAD,
00220                 },
00221                 .psc_cpt                = {
00222                         .cc_pattern             = mds_rdpg_num_cpts,
00223                 },
00224                 .psc_ops                = {
00225                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00226                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00227                 },
00228         };
00229         m->mds_readpage_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&conf, procfs_entry);
00230         if (IS_ERR(m->mds_readpage_service)) {
00231                 rc = PTR_ERR(m->mds_readpage_service);
00232                 CERROR("failed to start readpage service: %d\n", rc);
00233                 m->mds_readpage_service = NULL;
00234 
00235                 GOTO(err_mds_svc, rc);
00236         }
00237 
00238         /*
00239          * setattr service configuration.
00240          *
00241          * XXX To keep the compatibility with old client(< 2.2), we need to
00242          * preserve this portal for a certain time, it should be removed
00243          * eventually. LU-617.
00244          */
00245         memset(&conf, 0, sizeof(conf));
00246         conf = (typeof(conf)) {
00247                 .psc_name               = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_setattr",
00248                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = MDT_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00249                 .psc_buf                = {
00250                         .bc_nbufs               = MDS_NBUFS,
00251                         .bc_buf_size            = MDS_BUFSIZE,
00252                         .bc_req_max_size        = MDS_MAXREQSIZE,
00253                         .bc_rep_max_size        = MDS_LOV_MAXREPSIZE,
00254                         .bc_req_portal          = MDS_SETATTR_PORTAL,
00255                         .bc_rep_portal          = MDC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00256                 },
00257                 .psc_thr                = {
00258                         .tc_thr_name            = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_attr",
00259                         .tc_thr_factor          = MDS_SETA_THR_FACTOR,
00260                         .tc_nthrs_init          = MDS_SETA_NTHRS_INIT,
00261                         .tc_nthrs_base          = MDS_SETA_NTHRS_BASE,
00262                         .tc_nthrs_max           = MDS_SETA_NTHRS_MAX,
00263                         .tc_nthrs_user          = mds_attr_num_threads,
00264                         .tc_cpu_affinity        = 1,
00265                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_MD_THREAD,
00266                 },
00267                 .psc_cpt                = {
00268                         .cc_pattern             = mds_attr_num_cpts,
00269                 },
00270                 .psc_ops                = {
00271                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00272                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00273                         .so_hpreq_handler       = NULL,
00274                 },
00275         };
00276         m->mds_setattr_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&conf, procfs_entry);
00277         if (IS_ERR(m->mds_setattr_service)) {
00278                 rc = PTR_ERR(m->mds_setattr_service);
00279                 CERROR("failed to start setattr service: %d\n", rc);
00280                 m->mds_setattr_service = NULL;
00281 
00282                 GOTO(err_mds_svc, rc);
00283         }
00284 
00285         /* Object update service */
00286         conf = (typeof(conf)) {
00287                 .psc_name               = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_out",
00288                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = MDT_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00289                 .psc_buf                = {
00290                         .bc_nbufs               = MDS_NBUFS,
00291                         .bc_buf_size            = OUT_BUFSIZE,
00292                         .bc_req_max_size        = OUT_MAXREQSIZE,
00293                         .bc_rep_max_size        = OUT_MAXREPSIZE,
00294                         .bc_req_portal          = OUT_PORTAL,
00295                         .bc_rep_portal          = OSC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00296                 },
00297                 /*
00298                  * We'd like to have a mechanism to set this on a per-device
00299                  * basis, but alas...
00300                  */
00301                 .psc_thr                = {
00302                         .tc_thr_name            = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_out",
00303                         .tc_thr_factor          = MDS_THR_FACTOR,
00304                         .tc_nthrs_init          = MDS_NTHRS_INIT,
00305                         .tc_nthrs_base          = MDS_NTHRS_BASE,
00306                         .tc_nthrs_max           = MDS_NTHRS_MAX,
00307                         .tc_nthrs_user          = mds_num_threads,
00308                         .tc_cpu_affinity        = 1,
00309                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_MD_THREAD |
00310                                                   LCT_DT_THREAD,
00311                 },
00312                 .psc_cpt                = {
00313                         .cc_pattern             = mds_num_cpts,
00314                 },
00315                 .psc_ops                = {
00316                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00317                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00318                         .so_hpreq_handler       = NULL,
00319                 },
00320         };
00321         m->mds_out_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&conf, procfs_entry);
00322         if (IS_ERR(m->mds_out_service)) {
00323                 rc = PTR_ERR(m->mds_out_service);
00324                 CERROR("failed to start out service: %d\n", rc);
00325                 m->mds_out_service = NULL;
00326                 GOTO(err_mds_svc, rc);
00327         }
00328 
00329         /*
00330          * sequence controller service configuration
00331          */
00332         memset(&conf, 0, sizeof(conf));
00333         conf = (typeof(conf)) {
00334                 .psc_name               = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_seqs",
00335                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = MDT_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00336                 .psc_buf                = {
00337                         .bc_nbufs               = MDS_NBUFS,
00338                         .bc_buf_size            = SEQ_BUFSIZE,
00339                         .bc_req_max_size        = SEQ_MAXREQSIZE,
00340                         .bc_rep_max_size        = SEQ_MAXREPSIZE,
00341                         .bc_req_portal          = SEQ_CONTROLLER_PORTAL,
00342                         .bc_rep_portal          = MDC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00343                 },
00344                 .psc_thr                = {
00345                         .tc_thr_name            = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_seqs",
00346                         .tc_nthrs_init          = MDS_OTHR_NTHRS_INIT,
00347                         .tc_nthrs_max           = MDS_OTHR_NTHRS_MAX,
00348                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_MD_THREAD,
00349                 },
00350                 .psc_ops                = {
00351                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00352                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00353                         .so_hpreq_handler       = NULL,
00354                 },
00355         };
00356         m->mds_mdsc_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&conf, procfs_entry);
00357         if (IS_ERR(m->mds_mdsc_service)) {
00358                 rc = PTR_ERR(m->mds_mdsc_service);
00359                 CERROR("failed to start seq controller service: %d\n", rc);
00360                 m->mds_mdsc_service = NULL;
00361 
00362                 GOTO(err_mds_svc, rc);
00363         }
00364 
00365         /*
00366          * metadata sequence server service configuration
00367          */
00368         memset(&conf, 0, sizeof(conf));
00369         conf = (typeof(conf)) {
00370                 .psc_name               = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_seqm",
00371                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = MDT_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00372                 .psc_buf                = {
00373                         .bc_nbufs               = MDS_NBUFS,
00374                         .bc_buf_size            = SEQ_BUFSIZE,
00375                         .bc_req_max_size        = SEQ_MAXREQSIZE,
00376                         .bc_rep_max_size        = SEQ_MAXREPSIZE,
00377                         .bc_req_portal          = SEQ_METADATA_PORTAL,
00378                         .bc_rep_portal          = MDC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00379                 },
00380                 .psc_thr                = {
00381                         .tc_thr_name            = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_seqm",
00382                         .tc_nthrs_init          = MDS_OTHR_NTHRS_INIT,
00383                         .tc_nthrs_max           = MDS_OTHR_NTHRS_MAX,
00384                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_MD_THREAD | LCT_DT_THREAD
00385                 },
00386                 .psc_ops                = {
00387                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00388                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00389                         .so_hpreq_handler       = NULL,
00390                 },
00391         };
00392         m->mds_mdss_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&conf, procfs_entry);
00393         if (IS_ERR(m->mds_mdss_service)) {
00394                 rc = PTR_ERR(m->mds_mdss_service);
00395                 CERROR("failed to start metadata seq server service: %d\n", rc);
00396                 m->mds_mdss_service = NULL;
00397 
00398                 GOTO(err_mds_svc, rc);
00399         }
00400 
00401         /* FLD service start */
00402         memset(&conf, 0, sizeof(conf));
00403         conf = (typeof(conf)) {
00404                 .psc_name            = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_fld",
00405                 .psc_watchdog_factor = MDT_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00406                 .psc_buf                = {
00407                         .bc_nbufs               = MDS_NBUFS,
00408                         .bc_buf_size            = FLD_BUFSIZE,
00409                         .bc_req_max_size        = FLD_MAXREQSIZE,
00410                         .bc_rep_max_size        = FLD_MAXREPSIZE,
00411                         .bc_req_portal          = FLD_REQUEST_PORTAL,
00412                         .bc_rep_portal          = MDC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00413                 },
00414                 .psc_thr                = {
00415                         .tc_thr_name            = LUSTRE_MDT_NAME "_fld",
00416                         .tc_nthrs_init          = MDS_OTHR_NTHRS_INIT,
00417                         .tc_nthrs_max           = MDS_OTHR_NTHRS_MAX,
00418                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_DT_THREAD | LCT_MD_THREAD,
00419                 },
00420                 .psc_ops                = {
00421                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00422                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00423                         .so_hpreq_handler       = NULL,
00424                 },
00425         };
00426         m->mds_fld_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&conf, procfs_entry);
00427         if (IS_ERR(m->mds_fld_service)) {
00428                 rc = PTR_ERR(m->mds_fld_service);
00429                 CERROR("failed to start fld service: %d\n", rc);
00430                 m->mds_fld_service = NULL;
00431 
00432                 GOTO(err_mds_svc, rc);
00433         }
00434 
00435         EXIT;
00436 err_mds_svc:
00437         if (rc)
00438                 mds_stop_ptlrpc_service(m);
00439 
00440         return rc;
00441 }
00442 
00443 static inline struct mds_device *mds_dev(struct lu_device *d)
00444 {
00445         return container_of0(d, struct mds_device, mds_md_dev.md_lu_dev);
00446 }
00447 
00448 static struct lu_device *mds_device_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00449                                          struct lu_device *d)
00450 {
00451         struct mds_device *m = mds_dev(d);
00452         struct obd_device *obd = d->ld_obd;
00453         ENTRY;
00454 
00455         mds_stop_ptlrpc_service(m);
00456         lprocfs_obd_cleanup(obd);
00457         RETURN(NULL);
00458 }
00459 
00460 static struct lu_device *mds_device_free(const struct lu_env *env,
00461                                          struct lu_device *d)
00462 {
00463         struct mds_device *m = mds_dev(d);
00464         ENTRY;
00465 
00466         md_device_fini(&m->mds_md_dev);
00467         OBD_FREE_PTR(m);
00468         RETURN(NULL);
00469 }
00470 
00471 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(mds, uuid);
00472 
00473 static struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_mds_obd_vars[] = {
00474         { "uuid",       &mds_uuid_fops  },
00475         { NULL }
00476 };
00477 
00478 static struct lu_device *mds_device_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
00479                                           struct lu_device_type *t,
00480                                           struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
00481 {
00482         struct mds_device        *m;
00483         struct obd_device        *obd;
00484         struct lu_device          *l;
00485         int rc;
00486 
00487         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(m);
00488         if (m == NULL)
00489                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00490 
00491         md_device_init(&m->mds_md_dev, t);
00492         l = &m->mds_md_dev.md_lu_dev;
00493 
00494         obd = class_name2obd(lustre_cfg_string(cfg, 0));
00495         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00496 
00497         l->ld_obd = obd;
00498         /* set this lu_device to obd, because error handling need it */
00499         obd->obd_lu_dev = l;
00500 
00501         obd->obd_vars = lprocfs_mds_obd_vars;
00502         rc = lprocfs_obd_setup(obd);
00503         if (rc != 0) {
00504                 mds_device_free(env, l);
00505                 l = ERR_PTR(rc);
00506                 return l;
00507         }
00508 
00509         mutex_init(&m->mds_health_mutex);
00510 
00511         rc = mds_start_ptlrpc_service(m);
00512 
00513         if (rc != 0) {
00514                 mds_device_free(env, l);
00515                 l = ERR_PTR(rc);
00516                 return l;
00517         }
00518         return l;
00519 }
00520 
00521 /* type constructor/destructor: mdt_type_init, mdt_type_fini */
00522 LU_TYPE_INIT_FINI(mds, &mdt_thread_key);
00523 
00524 static struct lu_device_type_operations mds_device_type_ops = {
00525         .ldto_init = mds_type_init,
00526         .ldto_fini = mds_type_fini,
00527 
00528         .ldto_start = mds_type_start,
00529         .ldto_stop  = mds_type_stop,
00530 
00531         .ldto_device_alloc = mds_device_alloc,
00532         .ldto_device_free  = mds_device_free,
00533         .ldto_device_fini  = mds_device_fini
00534 };
00535 
00536 static struct lu_device_type mds_device_type = {
00537         .ldt_tags     = LU_DEVICE_MD,
00538         .ldt_name     = LUSTRE_MDS_NAME,
00539         .ldt_ops      = &mds_device_type_ops,
00540         .ldt_ctx_tags = LCT_MD_THREAD
00541 };
00542 
00543 static int mds_health_check(const struct lu_env *env, struct obd_device *obd)
00544 {
00545         struct mds_device *mds = mds_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00546         int rc = 0;
00547 
00548 
00549         mutex_lock(&mds->mds_health_mutex);
00550         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(mds->mds_regular_service);
00551         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(mds->mds_readpage_service);
00552         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(mds->mds_out_service);
00553         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(mds->mds_setattr_service);
00554         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(mds->mds_mdsc_service);
00555         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(mds->mds_mdss_service);
00556         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(mds->mds_fld_service);
00557         mutex_unlock(&mds->mds_health_mutex);
00558 
00559         return rc != 0 ? 1 : 0;
00560 }
00561 
00562 static struct obd_ops mds_obd_device_ops = {
00563         .o_owner           = THIS_MODULE,
00564         .o_health_check    = mds_health_check,
00565 };
00566 
00567 int mds_mod_init(void)
00568 {
00569         if (mdt_num_threads != 0 && mds_num_threads == 0) {
00570                 LCONSOLE_INFO("mdt_num_threads module parameter is deprecated, "
00571                               "use mds_num_threads instead or unset both for "
00572                               "dynamic thread startup\n");
00573                 mds_num_threads = mdt_num_threads;
00574         }
00575 
00576         return class_register_type(&mds_obd_device_ops, NULL, true, NULL,
00577                                    LUSTRE_MDS_NAME, &mds_device_type);
00578 }
00579 
00580 void mds_mod_exit(void)
00581 {
00582         class_unregister_type(LUSTRE_MDS_NAME);
00583 }
